rows.title: The fun dilemma
rows.proposal_json:
{"type": "bps-proposal-v1", "content": "# The question

Should we have fun?

# The context

It's all about fun, all around the world, at the same time.

# The vote

Answering `true` means we should have fun, answering `false` means we should *not* have fun.

For your vote to be valid, you must include a SHA-256 hash of the `title` concatenated with the `proposal_json` of this proposal.

# The tally

Votes will be tallied according to the principle of Archimedes, which will be tweaked until it makes sense.

# The timing

The voting period ends at block 8,000,000 (inclusively). Any votes cast after that willnot be counted. You also need to fill in the whole circle with your pen.
"}
